byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Rept on Indian trade with Brit, Jan, and with other parts of Empire Oct to date
snippet: CALCUTTA, India, March 2--Mohandas K. Gandhi undertook today to explain and interpret the resolution adopted by the Indian National Congress working committee yesterday, setting complete independence as India's goal....

headline.main: GANDHI SEES INDIA OPEN TO NEW TALKS; Civil Disobedience Campaign Is Now Up to British, Says Congress Party Leader VOLUME OF TRADE GROWS Exports to Britain in January Double Those of the Same Month a Year Before

lead_paragraph: CALCUTTA, India, March 2--Mohandas K. Gandhi undertook today to explain and interpret the resolution adopted by the Indian National Congress working committee yesterday, setting complete independence as India's goal.
